text: Geckoboard| Ruby Developer| ONSITE | https://www.geckoboard.com/careers/#op-155708-ruby-backend-d... Looking for candidate who is excited to work with Front-End team on developing new features as well as re-think and re-architect our existing system. Link has more info or email me direct thaisa@geckoboard.com Role based in London, UK (near Liverpool St. Station)
